&nbsp;
&nbsp;

I am a PhD data scientist with a passion for developing open, reproducible and well-communicated data science products. I enjoy learning and teaching, as well as mentoring and encouraging an accessible data science learning community. I support people and teams to be productive in creating and sharing data science tools and products, with a focus on building trust and achieving results.
